website_summaries.verdict: If you don't mind the high price tag and some longevity issues, this case provides waterproof protection for older popular models such as iPhone 5, 5s, or SE.
pros: Can withstand submersion for up to one hour in depths up to 6.6 feet
Has a sleek fit, and feels good in the hand
Meets the U.S. military standard for drop and shock protection
cons: Begins to show wear sooner than you'd expect considering it's one of the pricier options available

customer_reviews.title: Very low quality, cheaply built, and it shows.
customer_reviews.text: My first Lifeproof case lasted a good amount of time, but the case eventually started to warp in shape on back side of phone, and the case itself was disintegrating. My second Lifeproof case lasted less time and had the same issues as the first. This was my third "Lifeproof" case--at this point I should've known better.... This one arrived already warped--the back side of the case had a large bubble/warp, and the home button and camera cover are cheap--the texture of Saran Wrap. Yuck! It's a piece of garbage and returning, but what a waste of energy and time to repackage and drop-off at UPS Store....
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Home Button Screen Failure!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in January 2018 and the Home Button cover has no functioned properly since it was first used. The cover is loose and bubbly. I have had to reset my finger print password at least six times and during the last go around it will not read finger print. Very disappointed in this product for failing so quickly in a relatively minor short time and in a critical area. Manufacturer needs to exercise better quality control over the products. This problem seems to be an inherent problem, not one caused by use, overuse or abuse. I would really like them to refund by purchase price or, at least, replace the damage item.
customer_reviews.author: All M.

customer_reviews.title: Love Lifeproof - toilet tested!
customer_reviews.text: Yes! Lifeproof cases have saved our iphones on MANY occasions. We are a family that routinely drops phones on hard surfaces and yes, occasionally into toilets. If this is your family as well, Lifeproof is the way to go! Pricey, yes, but when they do eventually wear out I’ve had good experience with the company sending a replacement no charge. We went with the cheapest color we could find and then ordered a “skin” (decorative removable covering- think contact paper for your phone case) in the color/pattern my dtr wanted. This way she can change it out when she gets bored & we saved some $$ on the case itself. Win/win!
customer_reviews.author: Fancy and Fierce

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I updated the previous LifeProof case for my SE phone, when it wore out. I used my case in a harsh work environment and it held up very well. It survived paint splatter and heavy dust, as well as some extreme temps. I was very pleased with the case. It can be cleaned with an electronics screen cloth, and the waterproof feature with gasket is a plus. It does take very careful cleaning before installing your phone; otherwise the staticy nature of the plastic will attract dust to the screen. This is really the only problem. Finally the case took too much abuse after nearly two years, and I had to replace it. I would recommend this case highly, still.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kid proof
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. I've dropped my phone so many times and had my phone submerged in water by my child so many times. And it's never broken or gotten damaged. If you have kids you need the life proof case. it'll save you tons when your kids want to see if it flushes down the toilet. I would suggest getting a little superglue and gluing the rubber gasket that is in the Charging port flap. It can come loose and fall out. Also if you're a man and have a newborn, 1 piece of advice. get an athletic cup and wear it always.
customer_reviews.author: Ditorious

customer_reviews.title: Knockoff warning!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely NOT Lifeproof. I bought a Lifeproof case for my daughter over a year ago and it does exactly what they claim it would do, on down to the water test. This one, NO! The headset jack did not fit. The home button cover came off within a couple days. My son had it in his pocket while playing and the screen cracked. Then he accidentally dropped it in the washer with a load of clothes, NO THE WASHER DID NOT START, he grabbed it immediately out and his phone was soaked INSIDE the case! This is a knockoff...not Lifeproof at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Holmes

customer_reviews.title: and pretty protective. It is just a pain to remove ...
customer_reviews.text: Is waterproof, and pretty protective. It is just a pain to remove if you need to clean the case or just want it off. I did find a use a penny/dime take off trick on google, but even that at times proved hard. I may keep it, I may not... Still deciding. Overall, does exactly what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: lunacat2013

customer_reviews.title: High price low quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchase my second case on June 5 2019 and the cover/clear screen came loose and started to separate from case. This was my second lifeproof cover, first one the finger screen fail after several months of use,the screen will not let me hang up so I will have to remove cover to operate the phone. I never tested the water proof capabilities of the case,it was mostly to protect the phone from falling of my pouch (3 ft drop). I need to contact seller for the warranty and replace the cover. Price is to high for the low quality of product .
customer_reviews.author: Susan Resendiz

customer_reviews.title: Unresponsive to touch
customer_reviews.text: This case is sometimey when it comes to touch. The screen is unresponsive occasionally. In order to hang up I had to use the on/off at top and if it was an app the only way to end it was to switch apps then go back. Wasn't every time, just inopportune times which caused a lack of confidence in the integrity of the case. I thought LifeProof was a good find until this happened. Like one reviewer said, unless you absolutely need a waterproof case, this is it, otherwise everything else about it is not so good.
customer_reviews.author: Born to run

customer_reviews.title: great case.
customer_reviews.text: love the lifeproof cases. this is my 3rd case. this one if for my iphone SE and fits perfect, i have dropped my phone a few times already and it protected my phone. also fell in the water and did not get phone wet. along with this i purchased the lifevest for the case, i do a lot of kayaking and would hate to see my phone sink to the bottom of the river. the case does not muffle sound, the sound is crystal clear.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Great phone case for an iPhone SE. I initially received an obviously used case that appeared to have been purchased with a 365 day warranty, and used for 364 days before being returned. Complete with fingerprints inside the screen cover and hair stuck in the sticker on the back of the case. Disgusting. Amazon quickly sent out a new case and it was perfect. It fits together so tightly that I’m not sure I’ll be able to get it off. Love that it covers the entire phone and isn’t open over the home button like some OtterBox cases are.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora Cosmos

customer_reviews.title: Can't End a Call!
customer_reviews.text: I have just thrown this product in the garbage! I have always admired LifeProof and their quality products until now. This case does not allow an iPhone user to end their call. The proximity sensor is hindered/covered by the clear plastic of the case so the only way to end a call is to place a finger over the sensor at the top near the camera. Super annoying. Additionally, the case is so tight around the charging port that most aftermarket charging cords cannot be plugged in. After struggling with this case for 4 months it is now in the garbage and a case from a different vendor has been purchased. Will never buy lifeproof again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best case ever
customer_reviews.text: Always have bought these cases for mine and my husbandsphones. They work amazing. I am clumsy and drop my phone way too much. My husband is a hunter and has accidentally dropped his phone out of a tree. With that being said our phones still look and "act" brand new.Best case out there! They are thinner than the otter box which is also a huge plus! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping dust and water out. Improved over previous models.
customer_reviews.text: Provides decent protection against water, dust, and falls. I wash the case frequently and have submerged it for underwater photos with no leaks. I have always used LifeProof and prefer them to the bulkier OtterBoxes. This model seems less stout than the previous FRE unit I had, but it's about half the price and I actually prefer it. Has a built-in screen protector, which is much better at protecting from scratches than the rubber-to-glass front seal that previous models had. The charging port door/seal seems sturdier and the attached headphone port plug is a big improvement (lost the last one, which was not attached).
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Yep.  It’s a waterproof case
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to protect my phone in the event of rain, so I can mount it to my bike and ride. Haven’t really done the acid test and dropped it in a bucket of water but that’s mainly because I trust it... my main worry though is rain, not immersion. Beware though... make SURE the little gasket is properly seated in the groove as you assemble it, or you either will wreck the gasket, be unable to close the case properly, or both, and it will offer little to no water damage protection for your phone. Mine was a bit of a struggle but I’m confident it’s assembled right, now.
customer_reviews.author: Brother Garrulous Loquacious

customer_reviews.title: Tears to easily
customer_reviews.text: I have had this Life Proof case since May 2018. The charging port will not stay closed now and a piece is chipped off of the charging port cover leaving the phone vulnerable to water. (I did not drop it) The ribbon button that covers the volume on off switch as cracked when I received it New and is now torn. This is my 3rd life proof case and the soft rubber parts year too easily. I am not buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable. Effective.
customer_reviews.text: Very durable. My daughter has one on her phone. She drops her phone CONSTANTLY, but her phone has survived. I just received mine and I am pleased that it is not as bulky in my hand as i thought it might be. Only minor thing that I need to figure out is how to have it accept my finger print to log in. My daughter says she can make it do that but I'm not sure how. It isn't a big deal though bc I can simply punch in the code to unlock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy one!
customer_reviews.text: Would be 5 stars but the camera is a little fuzzy through the case. Other than that it’s great! The case is slimmer and more protective than the otter box. Lighter too fits better in a pocket. I do concrete for a living, I have dropped this case in the concrete with no issues. Rinsed right off with a hose. Dust proof. Bumped and bounced all day with no problems. Get one!
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: Buy This!!!
customer_reviews.text: Lifeproof cases are simply the BEST! My husband and I are both very active people who spend most of our days outdoors (rain, shine, winter, spring, summer, fall). We've tried other products (Otter Box etc.), but have still managed to break our screens or kill our phones with water damage. Our cell hones have lasted for years thanks to these cases. We will NEVER buy anything else!
customer_reviews.author: HSowle

customer_reviews.title: Case didn't last a year - awaiting warranty replacement
customer_reviews.text: Loved the case (it's my 3rd) but the durability is poor. I am not hard on my case or phone, but the edging around the rubber protective case started falling apart about a month ago (at the 10 month point). I didn't realize the warranty was for a year (discovered that here reading other reviews) and I have just requested replacement. If the service is good, I will amend my rating.
customer_reviews.author: Earth & Fire

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Gave this brand a second chance and will never purchase again :( The first life proof case that I purchased several years ago fell apart after a few months and I stupidly thought they might have improved.... they didn’t. The thin film that goes over the fingerprint button has already fallen off and the front of the case is already separated from the rubber around the outer phone case. Don’t waste your money. Definitely not waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: chastity beebe

customer_reviews.title: The case screen cover bows out and that makes it non water proof
customer_reviews.text: I had bought the exact cast a few years ago at Target and loved it. Unfortunately it did wear down along the side so I ordered the new one which is an exact duplicate of the one I love.a few days after putting it on my phone, the screen cover popped up and it won't stay in the edge of the case which makes it not very water proof. I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: susan greiff

customer_reviews.title: As advertised. It takes a beating and protects the phone.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Lifeproof case in the past 5 years and the only reason that I needed to new case is because of the damage that I did to the cases over the years. This case travels well and doesn’t add excessive bulk while providing water, dirt and drop protection. I have had all my cell phones in the Lifeproof cases from the moment they come out of the box and can honestly say that none of my phones have ever had any physical damage as a result. I highly recommend these cases to anyone with children, teenagers and cell phones at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: scott kramer

customer_reviews.title: Good for Waterproofing. Not worth it for anything else.
customer_reviews.text: I had a lot of problems with others hearing me during calls. My touchscreen would also not work occasionally. It's also a pain to undo the cap every time you want to charge your phone or unscrew the cap and have an adapter every time you plug in an auxillary cable. If you don't NEED waterproofing, look at something different. If you NEED waterproofing. This is a very good option. Just not perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Saved my phone from a giant puppy
customer_reviews.text: I almost never leave reviews, but I thought this product warrants one, as it did an amazing job protecting my phone from my 10 week old Saint Bernard. These babies are powerful chewers, so I feared the worst when she stole my phone from under my pillow, hid it in her crate, and went to town on it. But, lo and behold, even though the case was pretty badly chewed, the phone was completely unharmed. I also drop my phone A LOT, from various heights, and on various terrain (life with dogs and children), and this case has handled all of it with aplomb. All in all, highly recommend for clumsy, distracted parents and dog parents
customer_reviews.author: MilaJameson

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time purchasing this case, updated version is even better
customer_reviews.text: I got this case because I am clumsy and was tired of buying a new phone every 1 or 2 years after dropping them. This is very sturdy & not all that bulky either. They updated the sound cover so it no longer sounds muffled when i'm talking to people on the phone like it did with their previous version of this cover. Highly recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennipurs

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: I've had a LifeProof case before this one and it was great. The one before this lasted several years and did a great job protecting my phone. However, in about 9 months this phone case is falling apart. I haven't put this phone case through any crazy abuse either, it's only been regular use (phone in pocket, hand, table). The plastic protection on the front is almost completely gone, and then plastic around the vibrate switch is falling apart as well. I just feel that for the price, this was not worth it. I'm very let down by this product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Fournet

customer_reviews.title: The price is worth it
customer_reviews.text: I really do like the LifeProof brand. My old case lasted about a year until the rubber started peeling off. I got a new one about 2 months ago and so far so good. I drop my phone all the time and so far there are no cracks. Also I spilled a lot of water on it and my phone stayed dry. My aunt actually had one and accidentally put her phone through the wash, but it survived without any water damage.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Neider

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Been a fan of the Lifeproof brand for years with their protection of my iPhones. They only last about a year, but I put them through a lot. Wish this was a little cheaper since they don’t even sell the model of my phone anymore, but it’s worth the cost and it’s a legit LifeProof case and not a cheapo knock off one that’s going to fall apart in a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy but don't expect long term
customer_reviews.text: Good for protection against dust and keeping iPhone clean. Finger print protecter is no good waterproof is iffy sometimes work and sometimes don't. While the case is new it will hold but this is not a long term case. This case use to be the top dog in the business but not anymore, they fell of with quality everything is not cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you want to last more than 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 2 of these. More expensive case, better case, right? WRONG!!! My first one came from Best Buy for about $85. When it was 6 months old, it failed when I stepped off a boat too early, and phone was submerged to about 30 sconds. Almost lost my phone! Second one came from Amazon for about $40; I just ordered a new $12 case, because this one is shot after 6 months. The rubber protection around the face of the phone has started peeling off. If you want a waterproo case, buy a less expensive one!
customer_reviews.author: J  J  Greenhill

customer_reviews.title: Surprised! So INLOVE
customer_reviews.text: Love it !! I wasn't to happy when I ordered it because I wanted a pink one that is now discontinued so I found this one and I got it only because it was okay looking. Well to my surprise. It's not as dark as In the picture which I love it's a light pretty purple around the sides and a nice dark purple in the front & back. I'm so happy with my purchase! It's better than I expected. Wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Lasts about 6 months
customer_reviews.text: It's nice to have a waterproof case but often I have to remove the phone from the case to get the keypad to work. It can be really frustrating. This is my second one and it only lasted about six months before the face cover came apart. I just ordered my third one. I can't say I am sold on it but I would rather go with a known so so product than experiment.
customer_reviews.author: Bohart

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t intentionally try to see if the case was waterproof like they suggested but I accidentally knocked my phone in a lake and took about five minutes to retrieve it from the bottom. It had absolutely no issues. I took the case off to make sure the phone could dry out and it was completely dry!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Saved my phone.
customer_reviews.text: My iphone survived a full wash cycle in a front load washer after I forgot to take it out of my work pants. I use the phone in all manner of dirty, dusty, wet and muddy construction environments. After two years of abuse, the case is now dirty, beat up, and screen protector scratched...but the phone looks like new. The little circular cover over the fingerprint reader is now a bit too damaged to work well but, that is minor after what it has been through. Just ordered a new one!
customer_reviews.author: anotherbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t protect against back-pocket torque
customer_reviews.text: This doesn’t seem as tough and waterproof as the older models. I sat down with my phone in the back pocket of my roomy blue jeans, and the screen shattered. I guess it doesn’t protect against torque. Until then, it did great with shock and waterproofing.
customer_reviews.author: DogsInSeattle

customer_reviews.title: Protective of the phone but hasn't lasted as long as it should
customer_reviews.text: This was my second LIFEPROOF phone case and my last. I like that the case surrounds the phone and really protects it. I expected a case of this expense to last as long as the phone. The 'screw" at the bottom of the case broke and the screen is pretty scratched and hard to keep clean. The number for tech support goes to one of those "You've won a bunch of nothing" offers and not to tech support.
customer_reviews.author: nh

customer_reviews.title: Happy!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted this case because he works in an environment where there is lots of oil and he wanted his phone sealed so nothing gets through. So far he likes that the phone is all sealed. He also likes that the case is not as bulky as the Otter box defender and fits in his shirt pocket better. I can’t comment on the durability of this phone case because it’s new product that we are trying. But overall, so far satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Sweets123

customer_reviews.title: Overall reliable phone case.
customer_reviews.text: Much slimmer than the otterbox case I previously used. As far as protecting the phone goes, it is durable; however, the transparent screen-cover section scratches quickly/easily (even just being in a pocket with random daily items like keys, pens, etc), degrading your view of the screen. This model fits more “flush” against the screen and fingerprint reader than previous models, which is a big plus. Phone’s ability to read fingerprints through the case is a bit touch-and-go (pun intended?), but this can be remedied easily by re-inputting your fingerprints with the case on. Overall, solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Snuffy

customer_reviews.title: ... 5s proximity when being used with the 5's features like unable to re access the keypad the loud speaker ...
customer_reviews.text: The screensaver on this case interferes with the Iphone 5s proximity when being used with the 5's features like unable to re access the keypad the loud speaker and other features. This seems to be only in The 'Fre cases only. Not a problem in The 'Nudd case also made by Lifeproof.
customer_reviews.author: LDLKnows

customer_reviews.title: Practical proof
customer_reviews.text: I’ve trusted Lifeproof for years (over several phones). Each time, I’ve done the 30-minute water immersion before installing the cover onto my phone. This time is no different: It. Works. The drop test is always a bit harder on the emotions to perform, but I do it anyway. From at least five feet, my poor li’l brand new iPhone (and my new Lifeproof case) remain perfectly unbothered by drops on each side. Done.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Vine

customer_reviews.title: Broke within two weeks :(
customer_reviews.text: I've had one of these cases before and it lasted a few years, keeping my phone new and unscathed. Bought a replacement and this time the case has lasted less than two weeks before the sound button cover started to split. The split is deep enough that it ruins the waterproof feature. Now I'm pondering if returning through Amazon or Lifeproof is the way to go. What a PITA!
customer_reviews.author: D$

customer_reviews.title: Rugged and watertight case
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I’ve used these cases for at least five years on four iPhones. They go together easily and are quite durable. I have dropped my phones both on hard surfaces and into the water-no problem. The feel is more secure than a naked iPhone. The only slight problem is the need to screw in a watertight umbilical to connect mp3 or headphone jacks. The plus side is that I am absolutely confident that no moisture can enter the case.
customer_reviews.author: John Thorpe

customer_reviews.title: Great protection, poor scratch resistance.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the LifeProof FRE Series Waterproof Case for a backpacking trip in Hawaii. This case did the job well and kept my phone dry and protected during downpours. I found that the camera lens cover scratched quickly, making my photos blurry. Little disappointed in the scratch resistance of this case.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Well it does its job in that its pretty dang waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Well it does its job in that its pretty dang waterproof, sandproof, dropproof. BUT YOU CANT USE YOUR PHONE. But with the clear plastic that covers your screen, its nearly impossible to to the touch screen, the volume buttons, the call quality was terrible. My friend suggested that instead I find a waterproof case that leaves the touch screen exposed, and get a new tapered glass cover to use with it. Other companies make it, and its just as waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Catharine

customer_reviews.title: Lifeless Cover - Only lasted 6 Months
customer_reviews.text: I have owned it since June 2016 and the screen cover never laid correctly, there were always air pockets that caused errors in typing. Then, some particles started appearing between the cover and phone glass. I ended up having to take it off to clean it and the screen protector came free of the frame and it is now useless. This product is very expensive for the poor quality. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: The case and inside screen cover fills with a fine film of dust every few days
customer_reviews.text: This case is flimsy and the plastic cover over the screen isn't actually clear but sort of a dingy clear instead. The case and inside screen cover fills with a fine film of dust every few days. We've had this case for exactly two months and are so disappointed that we cannot return it.
customer_reviews.author: opparkerco

customer_reviews.title: I had performed "the paper towel test" recommended by the manufacturer and the case had passed indicating ...
customer_reviews.text: 2 days after i started using this phone case i accidently got my phone wet and my phone subsequently stopped working. I had performed "the paper towel test" recommended by the manufacturer and the case had passed indicating the phone case should be waterproof but clearly it wasnt. If you buy the case through amazon, lifeproof wont refund you for the defective case let alone the now useless cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: Ky Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Made Screen Look Greasy/Fuzzy
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed when I opened my LifeProof case. In the past I've had good luck with the LifeProof cases, but not this time. There was something wrong with the front half of the case. When I put it on my phone, it made the entire screen look greasy. I tried cleaning the case, but there wasn't any dirt or residue. There's a problem with the plastic itself. Since the screen makes everything look greasy/fuzzy, it's completely unusable!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl A. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never had a product fail as miserably as this one. The back of the case has gotten warped. The clear opening on the back has come undone and lets debris and moisture inside. The front rubber casing has worn off like an eraser. The front plastic casing has also cracked near the power buttons weak point. The toggle switch doesn’t work and is loose. The power port has always hard to open and will break your nails opening it. The audio jack has been such a pain to use that I needed to change to Bluetooth headphones. Overall I would advise anyone to purchase something else considering the price and the issues.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Love this case
customer_reviews.text: This is the third LifeProof case we've had in many years and love them. No matter how much the kids have done to the phone, there has never been any damage. And, more importantly, my husband has accidentally gone in the ocean and the pool with his phone in his pocket, and it's saved it from destruction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No response from warranty team
customer_reviews.text: There is a little audio cord adapter that is needed to use headphones with this case. After about a month, this cable became unusable. Now I am using my phone without the case. They have a warranty page with only an email as contact but no one responds to the email inquiries. Cannot hear rings or any sounds from the phone when the phone is enclosed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy the old style LP it is a nice product.  this one is a downgrade.
customer_reviews.text: LP made a huge mistake with this one. Their previous style was way more dependable and reliable. My new life proof case started to fall apart at the edges a few months after i put it on. The only reason that I bought a new one was because there was some superficial damage on the old one. huge! downgrade! they should send me a reimbursement for their crappy reverse engineering to accommodate the fingerprint which I don’t even use! buy the old-style if you can!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great case. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Awesome case! This is my second one. Very nice well made. Waterproof, thumbprint reader is iffy at times but I’m a mechanic so that might actually just be me. I wouldn’t hesitate to buy again. Only complaint is the headphone jack plug has sharp lugs on it for grip and it runs into my pinky while I’m holding the phone with my right hand. Causes some mild discomfort
customer_reviews.author: seth colin stewart

customer_reviews.title: Can You Hear Me Now? No, Not Really!
customer_reviews.text: I understand that it is "waterproof", however you suffer from poor communication as your callers cannot understand and hear you clearly unless you take the speaker and talk directly into the end of the phone, which removes you ear from the ear piece.
customer_reviews.author: David M. England

customer_reviews.title: Not lifeproof
customer_reviews.text: Within a few months the rubber began separating from the case. The plastic pieces covering the apple logo and thumb button thing all separates from the plastic so it’s no longer water proof. I’m getting a warranty replacement for 6$ but I’ll probably not buy this case again. It’s toast within 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Gonzoso

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: I have always liked the protection lifeproof cases offer, the only downside is that people have a difficult time hearing me on the phone. I have found that opening the charging cover often improves quality but it’s still a drawback
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: truly lifeproof
customer_reviews.text: Didnt realize it was a newer style from last lifeproof I had for same phone. this one seems much higher quality. Tighter fit as well with a much more secure snap closure around phone and on the flap over the charger port. Also the cover over the home button seems better too as I have much better results with fingerprint scanner. Over all excellent improvements on an already great case.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: WaterProof and Durable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my iPhone 5s that I have had for years. I had my previous LifeProof case for 3 years or so when it finally started to give out around where you plug the charging cord into the phone. I was happy to find this one in a very pretty purple color at a great price. You can't go wrong with these LifeProof cases!
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Thomas

customer_reviews.title: This morning s my second case and each tends to ...
customer_reviews.text: This morning s my second case and each tends to last approximately 5 months before the top edge starts to peel away. Mind you, the phone is entact, but unsure if the case is still waterproof. I’m going to look for other options. At $80 this is quite expensive to be failing at 5 months....twice.
customer_reviews.author: Scotsc1010

customer_reviews.title: Phone function wouldn’t work
customer_reviews.text: They changed the design of the screen cover and I couldn’t use the phone function . All apps worked great thru the film cover but once I went to the phone no buttons could be pushed and swiping didn’t work. They did offer a prompt refund and their customer service was great.
customer_reviews.author: Rhys L.

customer_reviews.title: Be careful.
customer_reviews.text: First one we got didn't work. You couldn't press any numbers or hang up the phone. We were able to return it and got a replacement a few days later. The second one was fine!
customer_reviews.author: P. Pryor

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted a month
customer_reviews.text: The case worked well for a little over a month. The screen protector part of the case fell off, and now my phone falls through the opening where the protector used to be. I’ve tried contacting Lifeproof to get a replacement under warranty. But almost three weeks later, I’m still waiting for the replacement, and Lifeproof hasn’t hasnt responded to my last message asking for an update.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for one year and seven weeks. I recently noticed that the clear plastic square on the back has come unglued, rendering it useless for waterproofing the phone. It is seven weeks past the warranty, so I'm out of luck getting a replacement. I cannot recommend it because it should have lasted longer than this.
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: Great case.
customer_reviews.text: This is without a doubt the best phone case I've ever had. My phone feels/looks secure inside this thing, there are seals everywhere on this so I'm not worried about water getting in, all the functions and features of the phone are completely usable inside the case. It's amazing that it doesn't add that much more to the thickness of the phone. Most case of this level of security I feel are overly bulky but this case does a good job of providing protection inside a fairly slim case. I will continue to buy these cases for my phones until something better comes along.
customer_reviews.author: TheBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It passed the water test. It doesn't have that odd bubble that can sometimes form between the screen and the plastic covering. I am surprised how much I love the purple color. I'm very happy with my new case, no more worrying about water damaging it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with change of design
customer_reviews.text: Return the first one due to the rubber peeling away from the protective screen after 1 day of not hard use. Received a replacement and it did the same thing after 3 days of just being in s pouch not jeans pocket. Comparing the old one to the two new ones there is less rubber over lap on the protective screen part. Since they changed the design we are going to look for another style for a protective case.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Vittorio

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the money
customer_reviews.text: When it works it works, early on I had no problems with this case and even took it with me to the pool and watermark multiple times without any water getting in. Had a few small drops (under 3 feet) with no damage. Only problem is now at less than 5 months the case is completely falling apart. All the edges and sides are literally beginning to peel off or tear. I just recently water tested it and even with all the tears and an opening on the volume control it still works as a waterproof case. So overall the case works well when dealin with water but doesn’t last very long
customer_reviews.author: Gino Narcisse

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasts, but only lasts a few months.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second LifeProof FRE case. Before they fall apart, they are waterproof, and they provide a standard level of drop protection. If you want to use a headset to talk, expect it to sound terrible right out of the box, as the vibrations received by the case itself can be heard through the headset. Within a couple of weeks, expect the headset connector to then wear to uselessness. Soon after that, the rubber will begin peeling. This company is massively overrated.
customer_reviews.author: Thanks!

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought 10 mos ago and am very pleased. The case is water tight, easy to keep clean, and very durable. I tend to drop my phone and this case has saved it many, many times. If I could give any neg comments it would be the fingerprint reader. It works great 9 out of 10 times, but does not always work the way it should. No problem.... I just tap it again and I'm in. Would definitely purchase again and would recommend to all!
customer_reviews.author: BumbleBee

customer_reviews.title: ... not used this product yet but people I know recommended this case
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this product yet but people I know recommended this case. I was looking for a waterproof case for vacation. I got it for $35 which seems to be a good deal. I won't be using this case until July 2018, will update then if needed. August 7, 2018 - The case worked great for the water in the pool and splashed. My phone was fine and no water leakage.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Every teenager needs this case
customer_reviews.text: I am an accident prone teenager and have both accidentally washed my phone in the laundry machine and gone swimming with it for 45+ mins. Luckily I had my phone in this case and it was totally fine. I drop my phone on a regular basis and it's still going strong. I think this works even better than the Otterbox.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: Junk after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: It worked well at first. 4 months later ( and past the return period) it’s junk. The case is hard to get on and off. The sound is effected. The plastic over the screen eventually cracked and compromised the waterproof feature. The peice that allows you to turn the sound on and off, broke off. The thumb print feature doesn’t work with the case on.
customer_reviews.author: CarrieB

customer_reviews.title: A Must if you Have Kids with Phones
customer_reviews.text: If you have a child with a phone - this is a must! 100% recommend. It's not too bulky. My daughter loved the plum color. My teenage son also has a lifeproof case. He left his phone outside in the rain - when he found it, his phone was in perfect condition. And needless to say, they have both dropped their phones numerous times and all good.
customer_reviews.author: MJY

customer_reviews.title: Officially being tested by a teenager
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my teenage daughters phone after her OtterBox Armor gave up the ghost. So far so good. If it can survive her it should have some sort of award.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Holding up
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always used one of these on my phone and this one holds up just as well as all the others I’ve owned. I’ve dropped my phone and the case has stayed intact. Was a little nervous, due to the bad reviews, but haven’t experienced anything they complained about.
customer_reviews.author: L. Aranda

customer_reviews.title: The bottom part were you can open it to plug ...
customer_reviews.text: The bottom part were you can open it to plug your phone broke the 2nd day of having it making it not waterproof anymore. Never had a problem with the other one I bought though. Must have gotten a badly made one.
customer_reviews.author: sara4521

customer_reviews.title: Best all around case for my iPhone
customer_reviews.text: I've used these cases for years on each of my iPhones. It keeps my phone from being damaged and I've never had a cracked lens when it has been dropped on a hard surface. It's totally waterproof for water sports and not bulky to keep in my pocket. Great colors too! The only down side is you need an extender connection when using your ear phones, but that is provided with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not really durable enough to be life proof
customer_reviews.text: I am really disappointed. In less than 6 months I have 3 different durability issues and now would not trust the thing to be waterproof. First the screen protector has a large scratch. Second the vibrate switch has started to some off and has a hole in it. There is also a piece of the rubber coming off on the side. A big bummer
customer_reviews.author: David One Zero

customer_reviews.title: A must for the forgetful fisherman
customer_reviews.text: I wade in saltwater a lot when fishing (usually on purpose!) and have forgotten to take my phone out of my pocket more times than I care to admit. This case keeps my phone safe every time. I can hear calls perfectly and haven't had anyone say they can't hear me on a call. Music or speakerphone is slightly muffled but with the phone being completely encased I can't imagine how they could avoid this.
customer_reviews.author: Ric Wasden

customer_reviews.title: Best ever Protection!
customer_reviews.text: Saved my iPhone when dropped at payed ticket stand engulfed in slush water for over an hour did Not damage my iPhone 7!!! Thank You LIFEPROOF!!!! Saved me over a $1.000 for a new phone LIFEPROOF the BEST EVER!
customer_reviews.author: Alive371

customer_reviews.title: Takes a beating and keeps the phone intact
customer_reviews.text: No telling how many times this thing has saved my phone from total ruin because of a high drop onto a hard surface (concrete, asphalt, etc) and water immersion on a couple of occasions. Best phone protector on the market IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: thescout

customer_reviews.title: This is truly waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This is actually the second one of these cases I've purchased. It is truly waterproof without being bulky. I highly recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Carroll

customer_reviews.title: I expected more
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was upgrading when I got this iPhone case (my previous one had been an Otterbox Defender) but within a week my kids have some how managed to tear the fingerprint reader cover bit, scratched the screen cover, and I’m a little bummed because I like the size of it. I’d say, if you are normal usage type person this would be a good cover, but if you are hard on cases skip this one
customer_reviews.author: jenni_bird

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: I am rough on things, this is my third one. They eventually tear within a year and start leaking. My phone still looks new , thanks to these. Have dropped in the water multiple times and phone stays dry. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: kk02

customer_reviews.title: Good case
customer_reviews.text: Had it about a month and it seems durable and is working as expected. I don't plan to test the water proof feature but thought it was nice to have. I was concerned that people would not be able to hear me, b/c I read some reviews stating that was an issue, but it hasn't been for me. Only complaint is having to unscrew the port cover, then screw in the adapter, and then plug in aux cord (wouldn't be an issue with BT compatible radios).
customer_reviews.author: David Alan Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Great case and fairly easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Great case and fairly easy to install. But not thorough enough directions in my opinion. I clipped the case together on my iPhone, AND THEN determined something was wrong. What I discovered (after going thru the remove / install process another couple of times) was that the "ringer / silent" switch on the side of my iPhone needs to be in the ON position before installing..
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Spina

customer_reviews.title: Failed after a week
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for a week, then the screen protector separated from the plastic frame. It only lasted a week, and all I really did was take it in and out of my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I also bought the same case in grey and that one works fine, so I don't know if it is just ...
customer_reviews.text: it doesn't work right. It fits a little small and I cant get the silent button to work at all. I also bought the same case in grey and that one works fine, so I don't know if it is just the purple case or what.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lack of durability
customer_reviews.text: I have had this case for about a year now. It started falling apart about three months into owning it and now chunks of it are falling off the case. I typically buy Otter box and usually Get about two years of worth out of those. I have been told good things about these cases and thought I would give it a try. I I have not been impressed . It started off waterproof but the more chunks that fell off the list waterproof it became.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Insell

customer_reviews.title: This case stopped functioning after 2 months!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it when it first arrived on Dec.17, but yesterday I had to remove the case to make my phone work correctly. With the case on I cannot use any punctuation at all as I cannot push the number button on the lower left side or the arrow up to capitalize any letters at all. I tried pushing the case down to have it make contact, but it’s not budging. It his case has been in use for just over 2 mos. now and it should not have given up the ghost so soon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LifeProof must not mean dude proof
customer_reviews.text: This case is has a slim profile and boasts a completely waterproof design, and it kind of is. But then it starts to fall apart. I carry my phone in my back pocket, as I am sure a lot of guys do. The rubber outer coating is very abrasive and will wear holes in your jeans! The rubber also does not hold up well; within four months of purchasing, the runner around the screen has almost entirely pealed off. Also, the laminate material on the home key bubbles and does not lay flat, impeding the use of the fingerprint scanner. Better to go with another company.
customer_reviews.author: theFarmingDude

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof and drop proof
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, dropped it a bunch of times and still works. Water tested, no leaks, I use it in the ocean. The only negative is the adapter must be used when using headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order
customer_reviews.text: I would give this product and seller no stars if I could. After one week of use this product broke and the seller accused me of lying about its use. It is expensive and should hold up for more than a week. Buy elsewhere FOR SURE. Shame on the supplier for supplying a faulty product and nasty service. Wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: Christy N

customer_reviews.title: Case waterproof under extreme conditions
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for husband (who doesn't care about color). Dairy farmer who's phone is abused regularly in many ways. Seems to protect FABULOUS. Does have to be opened up and cleaned occasionally, so some dust gets in.
customer_reviews.author: MGW

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this case for my previous phone. The durability is absolutely fantastic however many days have passed where I could not use the phone in the case because no one heard me or the sound was muffled.
customer_reviews.author: L Mayfield

customer_reviews.title: Overall great case
customer_reviews.text: I really do like this case. It's certainly waterproof and I feel very confident running through the rain with my phone on me! Very slim fit for the ruggedness of the case. It's hard to keep the screen clean. Also the home button cover gets a little bubbly and doesn't recognize my fingerprint. Rare that it happens, but happens enough to mention. Overall though, I do really like this case and I absolutely think it's worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in quality
customer_reviews.text: This case worked really well at first, but started to leak after a few months. Also, the plastic covering the phone face is thin/flimsy and easily scratched. Was hoping for better quality based on the price.
customer_reviews.author: aturtle1

customer_reviews.title: After a month, the film covering the thumb print ...
customer_reviews.text: After a month, the film covering the thumb print peeled off. So now there is air always trapped between the front case and phone screen and makes it incredibly difficult to type and text.
customer_reviews.author: Ana R Abreu

customer_reviews.title: Broke pretty quickly
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: This case started leaking! A crack appeared in one side and now moisture easily gets in from rain or sweat. I would not purchase this again. I want ny money back. Very disappointed to have spent so much on this. I love this. I used to have an Otter of tCommutor and this one beats that by a lot. The touchscreen works well. The sound is great. I've dropped it in water a few times and on concrete and once in the toilet and it saved my phone! I will continue to purchase this case for phone upgrades in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: LifeProof FRĒ SERIES Waterproof Case for iPhone SE (1st gen - 2016) and iPhone 5/5s - Retail Packaging - BLACK
product_meta.description: Style:Case| Color:BLACKSet out with LifeProof FRĒ for Apple iPhone SE (1st gen - 2016) and iPhone 5/5s and live with no limits. Waterproof and drop proof, FRĒ for iPhone SE (1st gen - 2016) and iPhone 5/5s has the guts to go into the thick of it and come out unscathed. Featuring a built-in screen protector, FRĒ shields your iPhone SE (1st gen - 2016) and iPhone 5/5s from Mother Nature’s worst. From ocean shores and mountain trails to desert dunes — no environment is too extreme for LifeProof FRĒ.
feature_bullets: Compatible with iPhone SE (1st gen - 2016) and iPhone 5/5s Not compatible with 30-pin to Lightning Adapters or the majority of non-Apple branded USB to Lightning cables

FRĒ: Built-in scratch protector is virtually invisible to the eye and touch; full access to buttons and controls - charge and sync through the micro USB port; profile: slim, sleek design follows your phone's precision lines
Water and Snow Proof: Fully submergible to 66'/2 m for 1 hour; Sealed from snow, ice, dirt & dust particles - meets or exceeds IP-68 Ingress Protection Rating
Shock Proof: Withstands drops from 66'/2 m - meets or exceeds MIL STD 810F-516

Proper installation of a LifeProof product is important to successful use so please review the installation video and check the user manual to ensure correct installation Includes LifeProof 1-year limited warranty (see website for details) and 100% authentic

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars3,243 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Cell phone case^instructions^general use headphone adapter
